home.name: home
paragraphs: Viko Official is your premier streaming partnership platform. We connect talented streamers with opportunities for growth and success.
Our platform offers comprehensive streaming support, from technical setup to audience growth strategies. Join thousands of successful streamers who trust us.
We provide competitive compensation packages and full support for our streaming partners. Your success is our priority.
Contact us today to learn more about partnership opportunities and how we can help grow your streaming channel.

rules.name: rules
paragraphs: All streaming partners must adhere to our community guidelines and maintain professional conduct during broadcasts.
Content must be appropriate for the platform and follow all applicable laws and regulations. Prohibited content includes harmful or offensive material.
Streamers are expected to maintain a minimum streaming schedule of 20 hours per week to remain in good standing.
Payments are processed monthly based on viewer engagement and subscription metrics. All transactions are transparent and trackable.
listItems: Maintain professional behavior at all times

salary.name: salary
paragraphs: We offer competitive base compensation for all streaming partners based on viewership and engagement metrics.
Additional performance bonuses are awarded monthly for exceeding viewer goals and maintaining consistent streaming schedules.
Partners receive full technical support, promotional assistance, and access to exclusive streaming tools and resources.

contact.name: contact
paragraphs: Have questions about partnership opportunities? We're here to help! Reach out to our team and we'll respond within 24 hours.
Email us at partnerships@vikoofficial.com or fill out the contact form below. We look forward to hearing from you!
